description:
I am divorce, If you are expecting a ken doll, I do have some weight. I am easy going, retired on a fixed income.
I like to joke around, I like sci- fi movies, ghost shows, cooking, and yes some times baking. I like to go out to eat, or travel by car in the U.S. only. No cruse ships, or air planes. I like, day trips, casino's, thrift stores, movies,
I like pet's but do not like taking care of them any more. Pretty happy go lucky person
